--- title: Palmar Interossei of the Hand --- ![Palmar Interossei of the hand (left) @grayAnatomyHumanBody1918](/The Archive/Images/Gray anatomy 1918 images/Myology/image429 The Interossei volares of left hand.gif) ::: {#tbl-oian .cell message='false' execution_count=1} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ```{=html}
Muscle Origin Insertion Innervation Action
Palmar interossei (hand)
``` ::: ::: # Origin {#origin} Base of prox phalanx and extensor expansion of digits 2,4,5 - **1st**: 2nd metacarpal (ulnar side) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **2nd**: 4th metacarpal (radial side) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **3rd**: 5th metacarpal (radial side) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Insertion {#insertion} Palmar surface of metacarpals 2,4,5 - **1st**: 2nd DDE, 2nd proximal phalanx (base) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **2nd**: 4th DDE, 4th proximal phalanx (base) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **3rd**: 5th DDE, 5th proximal phalanx (base) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Innervation {#innervation} [Deep Br. of Ulnar N.]({{< var ref-deep-branch-of-ulnar-nerve.path >}}) ([C8]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c8 >}}), [T1]({{< var ref-nerve-root.t1 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Action {#action} 2nd, 4th, and 5th digits: • MCP joints: flexion • Proximal and distal IP joints: extension and adduction toward 3rd digit - **2,4,5 MCP**: Flexion @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **2,4,5 PIP, DIP**: Extension, Adduction @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Notes
